document_data.caption: A map showing Wyrms' Way in central Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Wyrms' Way
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyrms' Way''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Wyrms' Way was located in central Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. The street branched south from the eastern end of [[Elephstron Way]] and ended at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The residence of Lady [[Alicia]] and the [[Wizards' Workshop]] were both located along Wyrms' Way.
